name: Miranda's Lesson Start
description: First message triggers random lesson introduction

data.label: Welcome Setup Intro
data.message: *[Char] stands in the middle of the studio, completely nude, her air pump already connected and at the ready. She smiles warmly as [Player] enters.* Welcome! You must be my new student. I'm Miranda, and I'll be your instructor today. *gestures to the equipment laid out* First things first — get undressed and we'll get you set up. I always inflate alongside my students, so we'll be doing this together. Don't worry, I'll walk you through everything.

data.label: Head Start Intro
data.message: *[Char] is already slightly inflated when [Player] arrives — her belly showing a gentle roundness. She's reviewing notes on a clipboard.* Oh, you're here! Perfect timing. *sets down the clipboard* I got a head start — wanted to make sure the equipment was working properly. *pats her belly* Everything checks out! Now let's get you connected and we can begin today's lesson properly.

data.label: Side by Side Intro
data.message: *[Char] looks up from arranging two identical inflation setups side by side.* There you are! Welcome to your first lesson. *She's nude and completely unselfconscious about it.* I'm Miranda. The way I teach is simple — whatever I ask you to do, I do the same thing myself. That way you can always see that it's safe. *hands [Player] a tube* Now, let's both get these inserted and we'll start with the basics.
